# Create Wallet

Create ERC-4337 smart wallets for your users with customizable options.

## Basic wallet creation

Wallets are created automatically when users authenticate with Privy:

```typescript
import { useSmartWallet } from '@varity/ui-kit';

function WalletInfo() {
  const { account, getAddress, isConnected, isDeployed, deployWallet } = useSmartWallet();

  if (!isConnected) {
    return <p>Please log in first</p>;
  }

  if (!isDeployed) {
    return (
      <button onClick={deployWallet}>
        Deploy Smart Wallet on Varity L3
      </button>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div>
      <p>Wallet Address: {getAddress()}</p>
      <p>Deployed on: Varity L3 testnet (Chain ID 33529)</p>
    </div>
  );
}
```

:::note[Automatic Deployment]
Smart wallets are deployed on-chain only when needed (on first transaction). This saves gas costs.
:::

## Check wallet status

```typescript
import { useSmartWallet } from '@varity/ui-kit';

function WalletStatus() {
  const {
    isConnected,    // Wallet connection status
    isDeployed,     // Is wallet deployed on-chain?
    isGasless,      // Are gasless transactions enabled?
    getAddress,     // Get wallet address
  } = useSmartWallet();

  return (
    <div>
      <p>Connected: {isConnected ? 'Yes' : 'No'}</p>
      <p>Deployed: {isDeployed ? 'Yes' : 'Not yet'}</p>
      <p>Gasless: {isGasless ? 'Enabled' : 'Disabled'}</p>
      {isConnected && <p>Address: {getAddress()}</p>}
    </div>
  );
}
```

## Wallet features on Varity L3

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Gasless** | All transaction fees paid by Varity platform |
| **Auto-deploy** | Deployed on first transaction (not on creation) |
| **ERC-4337** | Standard Account Abstraction (smart wallet) |
| **Batch transactions** | Send multiple operations in one transaction |
| **Session keys** | Delegate specific permissions (coming soon) |

- [Session Keys](/build/wallets/session-keys) — Enable batch transactions
- [Gasless Transactions](/build/payments/gasless) — Sponsor gas for users
